Atma and Psuedo guard over the weakened Technosis and make jokes about Deem=
os and KitKat, and that they love each other and stuff, they joke about Kit=
Kat killing DrillBit and Deemos and KitKat ruling the world, but then they =
destroy the 2 of them with a paper clip and the new rulers of the world are=
 the 3 of them. They laugh and decide to leave the cave. They leave the cav=
e and wander around. They come to the Predacon base, run by Rampage last th=
ing Soulstice knew. They call out.

"Hello, this is Predacon Atma with 2 fr=
iends, also Predacons." Atma says. He waits for a response...
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesd=
ay, September 19, 2000 5:11 PM
  Subject: Worm-Squorm And The Worm Squad


=

       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | Start a new group!  



  ::Decadel:=
:
   
         Decadel felt like destroying the remaing Predacons who were =
now under Phobia, after they we're weakened from the Maximals' attack.  In =
his underground factory, special bots were being created.  Soon, he would h=
ave 6 bots who loyally served him.  Subtrons.  Then he would show those Pre=
dacons.  Without any stupid Predacons in the way, he would then take out th=
e Maximals, and then, the hardest phase would be the Alliance.  Patience wa=
s required for the making of the Subtrons.  Decadel just had to sit and wai=
t, and then see how his fighters did out in the world.  For the while, he s=
at, and read a quiet book in his underground library, while keeping a close=
 eye on Hell Drak, from his newly established cameras, which he could see w=
hat they saw anytime.
